name: Dungeon of Chaos (botstarai)
description:
<<NOTE: The game is very unbalanced. Some you might die after the first level.>>

Dungeon of Chaos is a small game made in 3 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. This is my first Game Jam.

You play the game by using W,A,S,D to move around and your goal is to get as far down in the dungeon as possible.

Dungeon of Chaos is a rouge-like turn-based game. You play your turn and then the enemies play their turn.  

Kill enemies to collect coins. Coins can be used to buy upgrades. The chaos event can start after the fourth round. During the chaos event, the enemies does not wait for the player to make their turn. It is simply chaos.
